components.description: The capitalized word "on" followed by an exclamation mark (!) with a double-sided arrow above it.
components.title: On with Exclamation Mark with Left Right Arrow Above

description: The capitalized word "on" followed by an exclamation mark (!) with a double-sided arrow above it.
title: On with Exclamation Mark with Left Right Arrow Above

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Words with arrows
emoji_net_data.definition: ON! Arrow was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name ‚ÄúOn With Exclamation Mark With Left Right Arrow Above‚Äù and added to Emo http://emojipedia.org/on-with-exclamation-mark-with-left-right-arrow-above/
emoji_net_data.name: ON! arrow

apple_vendor_description: The 'on' arrow emoji on Apple devices is a bold, upward-pointing indicator rendered with a vibrant, solid color and a slight 3D bevel that suggests it's ready to be activated. Its sharp, clean lines and consistent shading are hallmarks of Apple‚Äôs precise design language, emphasizing clarity and direction. This emoji is universally understood to mean 'go,' 'start,' 'play,' or to proceed with an action, making it an essential tool for guiding digital interactions.
